titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: STAFF ROLE CARRYING OUT PERSONALISED CARE AND SUPPORT PLANNING - Description

div.p: STAFF ROLE CARRYING OUT PERSONALISED CARE AND SUPPORT PLANNING is the same as attribute STAFF ROLE CARRYING OUT HOLISTIC NEEDS ASSESSMENT OR PERSONALISED CARE AND SUPPORT PLANNING.
STAFF ROLE CARRYING OUT PERSONALISED CARE AND SUPPORT PLANNING is the staff role of the individual carrying out the Personalised Care and Support Planning.
